state_analysis: The command to run the training script encountered an error due to an ambiguous option for the '--dataset' argument. The script is unable to determine which dataset parameter to use. This indicates that the command-line arguments provided may need to be updated to match the expected arguments in the current version of the script. Results.json has not been created because the training process has not executed successfully.
explanation: To resolve the ambiguity with the dataset argument, we will check the correct command-line arguments expected by the script. We will explicitly specify the dataset name and any other required parameters to ensure that the command executes correctly. We will run the help command for the script to get the correct parameters.
